summary: This bill, the "States Taking On Power For Redressing All Unlawful Deceits in Medicaid Act" (STOP FRAUD in Medicaid Act), amends the Social Security Act to direct State Medicaid fraud control units to investigate and prosecute instances of beneficiary fraud. It specifically targets fraudulent applications for, and receipts of, Medicaid benefits by both providers and beneficiaries. The bill includes conforming changes and specifies an effective date 180 days after enactment.
